output.sentences: The men were ready to go snowshoeing for the day.
They put on all their gear and were excited to start.
It would be a long trek, but the guys all had smiles on their faces.
With a quick glance at his watch, one of the men told the others their stats.
It was a wonderful day of trekking over the mountain on a fantastic snowshoeing journey.
